title: Jason Mantzoukas Looks Back on This Year in Television and Film | The Watch (Ep. 313)
description:
Jason Mantzoukas joins to talk about the trailer for the ‘Triple Frontier’ movie (10:14), the new ‘Avengers’ trailer (17:57), ‘The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel’ Season 2 (34:31), and ‘Bodyguard’ (43:14).
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Jason Mantzoukas

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
